name: ValidateDiscountTemplate
description: Validates the given discount template information

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

BU.name: DateTimeValue
BU.description: Used for datatype DateTime and Date

BU.name: NumberValue
BU.description: Used for datatype Integer and Decimal

BU.name: StringValue
BU.description: Used for datatype String, Text and Enum

DM.name: Code
DM.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

DM.name: Message
DM.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

DM.name: RequestID
DM.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

DM.name: Type
DM.description: A short description of the error type.

DN.name: ExternalIDs
DN.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

DN.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
DN.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

DN.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
DN.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
